definition: Fudan University, Shanghai, abbr. for 復旦大學|复旦大学[Fu4 dan4 Da4 xue2]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
Fudan University, Shanghai

sentences.english: Fudan University students at their graduation ceremony in Shanghai last month.
sentences.chinese: 上海复旦学子于毕上月毕业礼。

sentences.english: Prior to this appointment, she was the Director of Sales at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Fudan.
sentences.chinese: 履新前，她是上海复旦皇冠假日酒店的销售总监。

sentences.english: There is going to be an English speaking contest in Dudan University next month.
sentences.chinese: 下月在复旦大学将有一场英语演讲赛。

sentences.english: They both graduated from Fudan University in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 苏淳和海萍都是上海复旦大学的毕业生。

sentences.english: Department of Gastroenterology, Huashan Hospital, Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 复旦大学附属华山医院消化科。

sentences.english: Here to discuss these issues is ProfessorJing Yijia from Fudan University. He specializes in public administration.
sentences.chinese: 来讨论这一问题的是复旦大学公共管理教授敬义嘉。

sentences.english: University is renowned as the best university south of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 复旦大学享有“江南第一学府”的美誉。

sentences.english: Fudan University is renowned as the best university south of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 复旦大学享有“江南第一学府”的美誉。

sentences.english: The president of Fudan University delivered the speech at 3108 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，复旦校长在3108发表了讲话。

sentences.english: Guo Juan is deputy director of the Office of Student Affairs at Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 郭娟是复旦大学学生会的副主席。

sentences.english: Peng Xizhe is the Director of the Institute of Population Research at Fudan University.
sentences.chinese: 彭希哲是复旦大学人口研究所所长。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Department of Chemistry, National Fudan University in 1947.
sentences.chinese: 1947年毕业于国立复旦大学化学系。

sentences.english: Li Ting, a student in Fudan University, is a handkerchief user who carries a handkerchief everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 复旦大学学生李婷就是一位手帕不离身的“帕客”。

sentences.english: Mei N. M. S. Thesis, Fudan University, Shanghai, 2004 (in Chinese).
sentences.chinese: 梅娜，硕士论文，复旦大学，上海，2004。

sentences.english: Chen G. M. S. Thesis, Fudan University, Shanghai, 2003 (in Chinese).
sentences.chinese: 陈光，硕士论文，复旦大学，上海，2003。

sentences.english: The editor-in-chief, Wang Guo'an, is professor of Chinese as a foreign language at Fudan University, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 本书主编者王国安是中国上海复旦大学对外汉语教授。
